newsitem.title: CANADA: WCE July canola falls C$15/T limit as Cargill sell.
newsitem.headline: WCE July canola falls C$15/T limit as Cargill sell.

text.p: Winnipeg Commodity Exchange July canola futures fell the expanded C$15 a tonne limit as Cargill sold, traders said.
"Cargill's selling the July but nobody seems to want it," a WCE canola trader said.
Lower Chicago Board of Trade soycomplex values also pressured WCE canola futures contracts, traders said.
Spot WCE July canola fell C$15 to C$367 a tonne at 1006 CDT and August canola sank the regular C$10 daily limit to C$354 at 1008 CDT.
